title: The Holiday Secret
description: When Evaliz's parents send her to New York to visit her sister, Tatiana for the holidays, she has no idea what the weekend has in store for her. After a devastating conversation with her boyfriend she is doubtful that her visit with her sister, who she's always been jealous of will be any better. After Tatiana reveals a shocking secret, Evaliz wonders how her life will ever be the same. Will Evaliz finally realize that the most important thing she could have wanted for Christmas was something she had the entire time?
author: Neva Squires-Rodriguez
